item.title: Little Nightmares Showcase set for June 24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/little-nightmares-showcase-set-for-june-24

Bandai Namco will host a Little Nightmares Showcase on June 24 at 12:00 p.m. PT / 3:00 p.m. ET, the publisher announced.

The broadcast will feature the latest information on the Little Nightmares series.

Possible announcements include Little Nightmares Enhanced Edition for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, which was rated in December 2023 and accidently released for PlayStation 5 on June 8 before being pulled from PlayStation Store, as well as the release date for Little Nightmares III, which is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025.

item.title: GRAPPIN coming to PS5 on July 4
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/grappin-coming-to-ps5-on-july-4

  • PS5

Currently available for Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC.

Tokyo-based developer POLYLABO will release grappling hook action adventure game GRAPPIN for PlayStation 5 on July 4, the company announced.

GRAPPIN first launched for PC via Steam on March 24, 2023, followed by Xbox Series and Xbox One on June 6, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via POLYLABO:

After a difficult awakening, you stumble upon the Grip, an artifact that can be used as a grappling hook.

Your mission is difficult yet straightforward: return the Grip to the Grip Shrine, perched on top of the highest Mountain. You will have to overcome many dangers and face the harshness of nature, from a blazing hot lava cave deep in the Mountain, to a dangerous ridge full of dangers.

On your way to the top, find the Relics to unravel the mystery surrounding the Grip.

GRAPPIN on PlayStation 5 features haptic feedback, and combined with the built-in speaker sounds, the DualSense controller will let you feel every grapple and impact.

Also introducing a brand-new motion sensor aiming, allowing you to intuitively adjust your hook shots by moving the DualSense controller, enhancing immersion and precision.

Are you ready for a gripping adventure?
